TextBlock.Text: RESON: The scouts have returned. They found an ancient city that's been frozen over by an ice storm!
BRIDGE: Wow, how peculiar! Have any remains been discovered?
RESON: Yes! It appears that the species was bipedal with bird-like legs, and they had antlers on their head. I'm excited to study them further.
RIM: Let me guess... you volunteered our team to investigate.
RESON: Am I that transparent, Rim?
FRET: Incredible! How was the city destroyed with ice? Were they not expecting it?
RESON: The planetary conditions do not allow storms of this severity to form. The citizens were likely unaware that it was going to happen.
